tasks: Do we have enough runway to make it to June?
Which customers are at risk this month, and what should we do first?
What's the smallest set of work we can do to hit this quarter's revenue target?
Why are we missing deadlines—what's the real bottleneck?
Give me a one-page brief I can send to the board about what happened this month.
Are we about to surprise anyone—in a bad way?
I need to cut costs without killing growth. What should we cut?
What should I personally do next week to maximize impact?
